import React, { Component } from 'react' class Form extends C{ constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ name1:" ", password:' ', age:" ", occupation:" " } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange(event) { this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}) console.log(event.target.name,event.target.value) } render(){ return (





); } }
